Book.Title: King Of Buffoons
Book.Description: Born to circus folk who prefer trapezing over parenting, Felix quickly learns to turn life's misfortunes into jokes.

Book.Title: Patil Arc
Book.Description: A mysterious request from the King sends him racing back to the city he destroyed.0

Book.Title: God Killer
Book.Description: Kissen kills gods for a living, and she enjoys it. That is until she finds a god she cannot kill: Skediceth, god of white lies.

Book.Title: Godlin Eater
Book.Description: On the edge of a little village, Remy discovers that a special breed of goblin;s meat is Wagyu flavored

Book.Title: Story of Voodoo Chicken
Book.Description: What happens when a wife puts a curse on chiekcn that's so good you'll lose your soul???

Book.Title: The Soul of a New Machine
Book.Description: The Soul of a New Machine carefully recounts the drama, comedy, and excitement of the early years of computers

Book.Title: Superintelligence: Paths, Dangers, Strategies
Book.Description: As Hollywood has been asking for years, what happens when machines surpass humans in general intelligence?

Book.Title: The Alchemist
Book.Description: Santiago, an Andalusian shepherd boy who yearns to travel in search of a worldly treasure. His quest will lead him to riches far different—and far more satisfying—than he ever imagined.

Book.Title: Lights Out
Book.Description: When an EMP devastates the nation's power supply, it doesn't take long for society to spiral out of control. There is no government to guide people.

Book.Title: How to Be Perfect
Book.Description: Schur uses humor to invite in the reader and disarm them into what feels like a conversation about ethics, and they leave feeling pretty good about themselves

Book.Title: Eating Salad Drunk
Book.Description: It’s Twitter minus the toxicity and crushing relentlessness and instead more art, finesse, and precision.

Book.Title: Hyperion
Book.Description: On the world called Hyperion, beyond the reach of galactic law, waits a creature called the Shrike. There are those who worship it.

Book.Title: 2am thoughts
Book.Description: This was a journey of nostalgia. I was swept up in memories of first love, first heartbreak, and healing, all within the span of one evening.

Book.Title: Godsfall Chronicle
Book.Description: Cloudhawk was a young scavenger who dreamed of being as free as the hawks in the skies, yet seemed destined to live out his life scrounging for scraps in the wasteland ruins.
